game.name: Signs and Seasons Explorer
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore time and space as you learn about astronomy and earn stars to buy overlays for the Earth and Sun and control the passage of time. Soon you will be able to simulate and observe Earth/Sun correspondences from any age and perspective as you use keyboard and mouse controls to fly through space.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore time and space as you learn about astronomy and earn stars to buy overlays for the Earth and Sun and control the passage of time. Soon you will be able to simulate and observe Earth/Sun correspondences from any age and perspective as you use keyboard and mouse controls to fly through space.
